remarks: The Hilbert lattice is atomic, i.e. any nonzero element is greater than or equal to some atom.  Remark in [Kalmbach] p. 140.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2001.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hatomic.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
hatomici $p |- ( A =/= 0H -> E. x e. HAtoms x C_ A ) $.
$d A x $.
